AI Description: WiggleTools is a software library for the analysis and visualization of data stored in the common genomics Wiggle track format (WIG), allowing researchers to efficiently manipulate, aggregate, and visualize large-scale genomic datasets.
Core Features: Analysis Of Genomic Data In The Wiggle Track Format (Wig), Efficient Manipulation & Aggregation Of Large-Scale Genomic Datasets, Visualization Of Genomic Data, Integration With Other Bioinformatics Tools
